summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirtieth Avenue South, from the south margin of Judkins Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street; Yakima Avenue, from the north margin of Judkins Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street; Judkins Street and Day Street, each from Yakima Avenue to Twenty-ninth Avenue South, and Irving Street, from Twenty-ninth Avenue South to Thirty-first Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 576 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
